00054 #ifndef INLINE
00055 #if defined( _MSC_VER )
00056 #define INLINE __inline
00057 #elif defined(__GNUC__)
00058 #define INLINE __inline__
00059 #else
00060 #define INLINE
00061 #endif
00062 #endif
00063 
00064 #include <stdio.h>
00065 #include <string.h>
00066 
00067 #include "mcstd.h"              /* Provides CAMAC access */
00068 #include "mvmestd.h"            /* using the generic Midas VME interface */
00069 
00070 /* VME Base address for each crate */
00071 typedef struct {
00072    int baseCrate;               /* translated VME crate address */
00073 } CBD_DESC_T;
00074 
00075 CBD_DESC_T cbd[8];              /* crate 0 ==>system CC mapping */
00076 
00077 /* VME CAMAC CBD8210 base address */
00078 #define CBD8210_BASE   0x800000 /* camac base address */
00079 #define CBDWL_D16      0x000002
00080 #define CBDWL_D24      0x000000
00081 #define CSR_OFFSET     0x0000e800       /* camac control and status reg */
00082 #define CAR_OFFSET     0x0000e820       /* Crate Address Register */
00083 #define BTB_OFFSET     0x0000e824       /* on-line status (R) */
00084 #define CSR            CBD8210_BASE | CSR_OFFSET | CBDWL_D16
00085 #define CAR            CBD8210_BASE | CAR_OFFSET | CBDWL_D16
00086 #define BTB            CBD8210_BASE | BTB_OFFSET | CBDWL_D16
00087 
00088 #define CAM_CSRCHK(_w){\
00089        DWORD cbd_csr = cbd[0].baseCrate | CSR;\
00090        *_w = *(WORD *) cbd_csr;}
00091 
00092 #define CAM_CARCHK(_w){\
00093        DWORD cbd_car = cbd[0].baseCrate | CAR;\
00094        *_w = *(WORD *) cbd_car;}
00095 
00096 #define CAM_BTBCHK(_w){\
00097        DWORD cbd_btb = cbd[0].baseCrate | BTB;\
00098                          *_w = *(WORD *) cbd_btb;}
00099 
00100 #define CAM_QXCHK(_q,_x){\
00101        DWORD cbd_csr = cbd[0].baseCrate | CSR;\
00102        WORD csr = *((WORD *) cbd_csr);\
00103        *_q = ((csr & 0x8000)>>15);\
00104        *_x = ((csr & 0x4000)>>14);}
00105 
00106 #define CAM_QCHK(_q){\
00107        DWORD cbd_csr = cbd[0].baseCrate | CSR;\
00108        WORD csr = *((WORD *) cbd_csr);\
00109        *_q = ((csr & 0x8000)>>15);}
00110 #define CAM_XCHK(_x){\
00111        DWORD cbd_csr = cbd[0].baseCrate | CSR;\
00112        WORD csr = *((WORD *) cbd_csr);\
00113        *_x = ((csr & 0x4000)>>14);}
00114 
00115 /* VME handle */
00116 int vh;
00117 
00118 /*****************************************************************\
00119 *                                                                 *
00120 * Input functions                                                 *
00121 *                                                                 *
00122 \*****************************************************************/
00123 
00124 INLINE void cam16i(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, WORD * d)
00125 {
00126    int ext;
00127 
00128    ext = (cbd[c].baseCrate + CBDWL_D16 + (n << 11) + (a << 7) + (f << 2));
00129    *d = *((unsigned short *) ext);
00130 /*  printf("cam16i: c%dn%da%df%d = ext[0x%x] -> 0x%x \n", c,n,a,f,ext, *d); */
00131 }
00132 
00133 /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
00134 
00135 INLINE void cam24i(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, DWORD * d)
00136 {
00137    int ext;
00138    WORD dh, dl;
00139 
00140    ext = (cbd[c].baseCrate + CBDWL_D24 + (n << 11) + (a << 7) + (f << 2));
00141    dh = *((unsigned short *) ext);
00142 /*  printf("cam24i: c%dn%da%df%d = ext[0x%x - ", c,n,a,f,ext); */
00143    ext += 2;
00144    dl = *((unsigned short *) ext);
00145 
00146    *d = ((dh << 16) | dl) & 0xffffff;
00147 /*  printf("0x%x] -> (0x%x) - (0x%x) -> 0x%x \n", ext,dh,dl,*d); */
00148 }
00149 
00150 /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
00151 
00152 INLINE void cam16i_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00153                      WORD * d, int *x, int *q)
00154 {
00155    WORD csr;
00156 
00157    cam16i(c, n, a, f, d);
00158    cami(0, 29, 0, 0, &csr);
00159    *x = ((csr & 0x4000) != 0) ? 1 : 0;
00160    *q = ((csr & 0x8000) != 0) ? 1 : 0;
00161 }
00162

00164 
00165 INLINE void cam24i_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00166                      DWORD * d, int *x, int *q)
00167 {
00168    WORD csr;
00169 
00170    cam24i(c, n, a, f, d);
00171    cami(0, 29, 0, 0, &csr);
00172    *x = ((csr & 0x4000) != 0) ? 1 : 0;
00173    *q = ((csr & 0x8000) != 0) ? 1 : 0;
00174 }
00175 
00176 /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
00177 
00178 INLINE void cam16i_r(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00179                      WORD ** d, const int r)
00180 {
00181    int i;
00182 
00183    for (i = 0; i < r; i++)
00184       cam16i(c, n, a, f, (*d)++);
00185 }
00186 
00187 /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
00188 
00189 INLINE void cam24i_r(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00190                      DWORD ** d, const int r)
00191 {
00192    int i;
00193 
00194    for (i = 0; i < r; i++)
00195       cam24i(c, n, a, f, (*d)++);
00196 }
00197 
00198 /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
00199 
00200 INLINE void cam16i_rq(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00201                       WORD ** d, const int r)
00202 {
00203    WORD dtemp;
00204    WORD csr, i;
00205 
00206    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00207       cam16i(c, n, a, f, &dtemp);
00208       cami(0, 29, 0, 0, &csr);
00209       if ((csr & 0x8000) != 0)
00210          *((*d)++) = dtemp;
00211       else
00212          break;
00213    }
00214 }
00215 
00216 /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
00217 
00218 INLINE void cam24i_rq(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00219                       DWORD ** d, const int r)
00220 {
00221    DWORD i, dtemp;
00222    WORD csr;
00223 
00224    for (i = 0; i < (DWORD) r; i++) {
00225       cam24i(c, n, a, f, &dtemp);
00226       cami(0, 29, 0, 0, &csr);
00227       if ((csr & 0x8000) != 0)
00228          *((*d)++) = dtemp;
00229       else
00230          break;
00231    }
00232 }
00233

00240 
00241    for (aa = a; aa < a + r; aa++)

00280 INLINE void cami(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, WORD * d)
00281 {
00282    cam16i(c, n, a, f, d);
00283 }

00285 /*****************************************************************\
00286 *                                                                 *
00287 * Output functions                                                *
00288 *                                                                 *
00289 \*****************************************************************/
00290 
00291 INLINE void cam16o(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, WORD d)
00292 {
00293    int ext;
00294 
00295    ext = (cbd[c].baseCrate + CBDWL_D16 + (n << 11) + (a << 7) + (f << 2));
00296    *((unsigned short *) ext) = d;
00297 }
00298 
00299 /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
00300 
00301 INLINE void cam24o(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, DWORD d)
00302 {
00303    int ext;
00304    unsigned short dtmp;
00305 
00306    ext = (cbd[c].baseCrate + CBDWL_D24 + (n << 11) + (a << 7) + (f << 2));
00307    dtmp = (unsigned short) ((d >> 16) & 0xff);
00308    *((unsigned short *) ext) = dtmp;
00309    dtmp = (unsigned short) (d & 0xffff);
00310    ext += 2;
00311    *((unsigned short *) ext) = dtmp;
00312 }
00313

00321    cam16o(c, n, a, f, d);

00323    *x = ((csr & 0x4000) != 0) ? 1 : 0;
00324    *q = ((csr & 0x8000) != 0) ? 1 : 0;

00347 /*****************************************************************\
00348 *                                                                 *
00349 * Command functions                                               *
00350 *                                                                 *
00351 \*****************************************************************/
00352 
00353 INLINE int camc_chk(const int c)
00354 {
00355    int crate_status;
00356 
00357    CAM_BTBCHK(&crate_status);
00358    if (((crate_status >> c) & 0x1) != 1)
00359       return -1;
00360    return 0;
00361 }
00362 
00363 /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
00364 
00365 INLINE void camc(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f)
00366 {
00367    /* Following the CBD8210 manual */
00368    WORD dtmp;
00369 
00370    if (f < 16)
00371       cam16i(c, n, a, f, &dtmp);
00372    else if (f < 24)
00373       cam16o(c, n, a, f, 0);
00374    else
00375       cam16i(c, n, a, f, &dtmp);
00376 }
00377 
00378 /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
00379 
00380 INLINE void camc_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, int *q)
00381 {
00382    WORD csr;
00383 
00384    camc(c, n, a, f);
00385    cami(0, 29, 0, 0, &csr);
00386    *q = ((csr & 0x8000) != 0) ? 1 : 0;
00387 }
00388

00391 INLINE void camc_sa(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, const int r)
00392 {
00393    int aa;
00394 
00395    for (aa = a; aa < a + r; aa++)
00396       camc(c, n, aa, f);
00397 }

00401 INLINE void camc_sn(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, const int r)
00402 {
00403    int nn;
00404 
00405    for (nn = n; nn < n + r; nn++)
00406       camc(c, nn, a, f);
00407 }

00409 /*****************************************************************\
00410 *                                                                 *
00411 * General functions                                               *
00412 *                                                                 *
00413 \*****************************************************************/
00414 
00415 INLINE int cam_init(void)
00416 {
00417    int branch = 0, crate, vmecrate, err, am;
00418 
00419    /* Open in A24D16 */
00420    vh = vme_open(0, MVME_A24D16);
00421    if (vh >= 0) {
00422       am = MVME_AMOD_A24_ND;
00423       vme_ioctl(vh, MVME_IOCTL_AMOD_SET, &am);
00424       vme_ioctl(vh, MVME_IOCTL_AMOD_GET, &am);
00425 
00426       /* mapping all crates */
00427       for (crate = 0; crate < 8; crate++) {
00428          vmecrate = (CBD8210_BASE | branch << 19 | crate << 16);
00429          vme_mmap(vh, (void **) &(cbd[crate].baseCrate), vmecrate, 0x10000);
00430          /*
00431             printf("am 0x%x - baseCrate[%i] = 0x%x <- 0x%x\n", am, crate, 
00432             cbd[crate].baseCrate, vmecrate);
00433           */
00434       }
00435    } else {
00436       printf("cam_init: No more device space\n");
00437       return 0;
00438    }
00439 
00440    return SUCCESS;
00441 }
00442 
00443 /*---------------------------------------------------------------*/
00444 
00445 INLINE void cam_exit(void)
00446 {
00447    int crate;
00448 
00449    for (crate = 0; crate < 8; crate++)
00450       vme_unmap(vh, &cbd[crate].baseCrate, 0x10000);
00451    vme_close(vh);
00452 }

00581 void csr(void)
00582 {
00583    WORD online;
00584 
00585    CAM_CSRCHK(&online);
00586    printf("CSR Camac  status 0x%4.4x\n", online);
00587 }
00588 
00589 void car(void)
00590 {
00591    WORD online;
00592 
00593    CAM_CARCHK(&online);
00594    printf("CAR Online status 0x%4.4x\n", online);
00595 }
00596 
00597 void btb(void)
00598 {
00599    WORD online;
00600 
00601    CAM_BTBCHK(&online);
00602    printf("BTB Online status 0x%4.4x\n", online);
00603 }

00605 void camop(void)
00606 {
00607    csr();
00608    car();
00609    btb();
00610 }
